description: FreshBooks is a cloud-based accounting software service designed for small and medium-sized businesses, offering features like invoicing, expense tracking, and time management.

tools.name: FRESHBOOKS_LIST_BUSINESSES
tools.description: Tool to list all businesses associated with the authenticated user.

tools.name: FRESHBOOKS_LIST_PROJECTS
tools.description: Tool to list all projects for a business. Use after confirming the business ID.

inputSchema.title: ListProjectsRequest

active.title: Active
active.description: If true, returns only active projects

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description: Field by which to sort returned projects

complete.title: Complete
complete.description: If true, returns only completed projects

skip_group.title: Skip Group
skip_group.description: If true, omits the group field from each project

business_id.title: Business Id
business_id.description: The unique identifier of the business to list projects for

updated_since.title: Updated Since
updated_since.description: Only return projects updated at or after this UTC datetime (RFC3339)

include_logged_duration.title: Include Logged Duration
include_logged_duration.description: If true, includes logged duration (in seconds) for each project

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing projects under a business.
